screen.travelstaff.nameless: Enter a name to use it
tooltip.travelstaff.travel_anchor_block: Look at this with a Travel Staff, or Teleportation enchantment to teleport.
tooltip.travelstaff.travel_staff: Sneak + Right-Click to short range Teleport. Look at Travel Anchor to warp.
enchantment.travelstaff.teleportation.de: Allows you to teleport as though holding a Staff of Travelling
enchantment.travelstaff.range.desc: Increases the distance you may teleport with a Staff of Travelling
